title: New Masteries Super OP
body:
Dang....some of the new Masteries coming out are OP as...

For example

Stormraider's Surge (1 rank):
Rank 1: Dealing 30% of a champion's max Health within 2 seconds grants you 35% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (10 second cooldown).

Why is this Mastery OP? well..if {{champion:67}} its not that hard to deal 30% of someones max HP in 2 seconds late game / anytime in the game then she gets a massive speed boost to ether finish you off you dash to the rest of the team.

There are also many more OP masteries such as

Thunderlord's Decree (1 rank):
Rank 1: Your 3rd attack or spell on an enemy champion shocks the area around them, dealing 10 damage per level plus 20% of your Bonus Attack Damage and 10% of your Ability Power as Magic damage to enemies in the area (30 second cooldown).

or

Grasp of the Undying (1 rank):
Rank 1: Every 4 seconds in combat your next attack against an enemy champion steals life equal to 3% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions).

which will be broken asf with {{champion:67}}

replies.body:
Hate to burst your little theorycrafting bubble, but stormraiders surge is going to be deep in the utility tree, so it's something that vayne will never get to use, and certainly wont be OP on her.

Grasp of the undying is going to be in the defensive tree, so again, vayne won't be using it.

I can see thunderlords decree getting reworked or at least numbers changed.
Yea, the others were just ones they could also possibly use :)
